objects.text:
• Premium Bubble Solution
• Creates BIG, BRIGHT Bubbles
• Eco-Friendly & Non-Toxic
• Won't Stain Clothes or Furniture

product_details.description: This top secret “super solution” has been formulated to create the biggest, brightest, most colorful bubbles on earth! You’ll be ready for hours and hours of fun with your favorite gazillion products with this oversized solution refill bottle. This premium solution is eco-friendly, safe, non-toxic, and will not stain clothing or furniture. With Gazillion Bubbles, you’ll run out of breath before you run out of bubbles! Great Bubbles for Kids.  Appropriate for ages 3 years and up. Multi-color.

banner_details:
This vibrant promotional banner features a cheerful and playful layout tailored for a bubble solution product. It has a light blue background filled with soft gradient circles and semi-transparent bubble overlays, giving the design a whimsical floaty effect. The left section contains three bold text layers: a main headline ("heading_1" and "heading_2") in deep purple, a fun subheading in green ("tagline"), and a short list of product benefits in black ("description"). Pricing details include a small label ("price_label") and a bold, attention-grabbing amount ("price"), both placed above a bright green call-to-action button ("cta_button") featuring white text ("cta"). A large image of the product ("product_image") dominates the right side. The layout is clean, playful, and purpose-driven.

**Color Palette:**
- Sky Blue (#8CDBFF)
- Deep Purple (#5A189A)
- Lime Green (#66CC66)
- Black (#333333)
- White (#FFFFFF)
product_color: The product image features a playful and vibrant color palette that instantly communicates fun and energy, ideal for attracting kids. Dominant colors include a bright, translucent green for the bubble solution and bottle (HEX #7EF27F), a rich purple used in the label background (HEX #8B4DCC), and a bold yellow-orange for the word "Bubbles" (HEX #FFC700). The "Gazillion" logo uses a blend of light green (HEX #C2F430), dark blue (HEX #283775), and a fiery red-orange outline (HEX #FF6C00). Pastel blues (HEX #A6D9F8) and pinks (HEX #E8B2F1) in the bubbles create a soft contrast to the neon elements, making the label pop.
